text: Thanks <@U01NRM1BS3A>, but how would i trigger that property to increase? The custom object being associated would already be created, so I cannot trigger when it gets created.
<@U05KNCMAE7N>, any thoughts on question 1? Is the UI Kit incorrect, or am I missing something in the documentation?

I may have misunderstood your question? I have not done it for reloading a card but the association counter should go up by 1 on association pretty quick, less than a second.
So the Custom object may be created but when you actually associate it to the deal, that is when the counter would go up.
If you want to reload on a changed property on the custom object, then I think that is not possible.
I assume you have done these Rollup properties that count number of associated objects, custom or not <@UTYRPALSZ>
